rooms.description: Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the façade for natural light. Vastu-aligned north-east wall includes a feature window.
Master bedroom featuring ample space and storage, with a south-west corner placement following Vastu guidelines.
Second bedroom designed for privacy and comfort.
Guest room with integrated closet space.
Kitchen with modern amenities and adjacent to the dining area, following Vastu principles by positioning it in the southeast corner.
Dining area near the kitchen for convenience and communal interaction.
Bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom; includes ventilation windows following Vastu practices for proper drainage of negativity.

openings.description: Large opening to connect indoor space with the central courtyard, promoting air circulation.
Floor-to-ceiling window for ample natural light in the living room area.
Door connecting the kitchen with the dining area.
Window openings on courtyard walls for privacy and natural light.

features.description: Rooftop terrace providing outdoor living space with scenic views, designed with Vastu guidelines to ensure energy flow.
Central courtyard acting as the focal point of the villa for natural light and ventilation, aligned with traditional Chettinad style.
